official_title: To provide for special rules relating to assistance concerning the Greensburg, Kansas tornado.

summary.text: Greensburg, Kansas Recovery Extension Act - Requires funds from any national emergency grant made under the Workforce Investment Act of 1998 to address the effects of the May 4, 2007, Greensburg, Kansas, tornado to remain available for expenditure through June 30, 2010.

titles.title: To provide for special rules relating to assistance concerning the Greensburg, Kansas tornado.
